name: Appropriations - S/C on Infrastructure, Resiliency & Invest

participants.name: Appropriations - S/C on Infrastructure, Resiliency & Invest

agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Infrastructure, Resiliency & Invest TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Wednesday, February 20, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Giovanni Capriglione The House Appropriations subcommittee on Infrastructure, Resiliency, & Investment will meet to consider the following: · Capital Needs for state agencies · Information Technology across all articles · Texas Child Support Enforcement System 2.0 (T2) Project The committee will hear invited testimony only. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
